room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: We had a fantastic time with the staff. Eian was awesome as he made the game enjoyable yet challenging with our few hints. We took on the Hostage room and it was extremely lifelike. No spoilers here - if you ever had an interest, you need to try them first! Run by true professionals. Thank you for making our first experience one to remember.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: I went with a group of four,  and we were in the Hostage room. It was a great setup, very lifelike and keeps you on edge! I enjoyed myself and we definitely plan on going back soon!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: We had so much fun! Visited my friend earlier this month. Her, her daughter and myself did the Hostage room. This was my first escape. Jordan was so fun, he was helpful and funny and really encouraged us when we weren't doing so well. We made it out with 4 minutes to spare! The clues were very clever and their use of electronics was so inventive! Great fun!

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Amazing fun! Something different to do. Good for a special occasion.

room_title: Escape room "Hostage" by Breakout Games - Charlotte in Charlotte
review: Today we celebrated our daughter's birthday in the Hostage room. The game master was very nice and gave us great hints along the way. I definitely would recommend this spot for everyone.
